title: Kálmán Csengeri
summary: Kálmán Csengeri (born 20 September 1959) is a Hungarian weightlifter. He competed in the men's middleweight event at the 1988 Summer Olympics.
content:
Kálmán Csengeri (born 20 September 1959) is a Hungarian weightlifter. He competed in the men's middleweight event at the 1988 Summer Olympics.
